description:
AOC has run out of things to justify her stance on open borders. This must be why she decided to make up a claim that Tom Homan going on Fox News is somehow correlated with higher rates of human trafficking. And calling that the most absurd thing a politician has ever said with a straight face would be an understatement.

AOC: Every time Tom Homan goes on TV, the border gets less secure. pic.twitter.com/i4XXXYiXAy
— Townhall.com (@townhallcom) March 18, 2025


I just can't deal with this level of stupidity. However, it's
title: Rep. AOC makes ludicrous claim border czar Tom Homan is making our border LESS safe, blames him for human trafficking

description:
One would assume that a female athlete would have no problem barring men from female sports but never underestimate the stupidity among leftists who pathetically wish to remain relevant.

Megan Rapinoe has slammed Trump’s executive order that bars males from women’s sports, despite previously losing to a bunch of teenage boys.

Megan Rapinoe brands Trump’s ban on
title: Female sports "star" Megan Rapinoe calls it DEPRAVED how Donald Trump doesn't think boys should compete against girls

description:
Chuck Schumer has made it clear how much he disapproves of those who prefer to keep more of their hard-earned money rather than see it spent by the government on things the American people never approved of.

Chuck Schumer attacks Americans who want to keep more of their money: "Their attitude is, 'I made my money all by myself. How dare your government take my money from me?'" pic.twitter.com/RoFmmquc8Z
— Townhall.com (@townhallcom) March 18, 2025

It’s people like him who made the phrase “No taxation without representation” a ral
title: Chuck Schumer claims real problem is too many Americans get upset when government takes their hard earned money from them

description:
According to Joy Behar, Americans are too dumb to understand why the United States is supposedly obligated to fund the war in Ukraine. However, the real scandal is not what she said but that she proved to lack all forms of self-awareness, as she projected her insecurities onto half the country.

Joy Behar notes that none of the candidates people are floating for Democratic Party leader are popular: "...not one AOC, Kamala, Bernie, Hakeem, Barack, Newsom, none of them has more than 9% of the approval of the party as leader."
She claims others are too dumb to understand… pic.twitter.com/EBXjJ1Fkhk
— Nicholas Fondacaro (@NickFondacaro) Mar
title: Joy Behar lashes out at Americans (again), claims we're too dumb to understand how awesome leaders like AOC are

description:
After images surfaced of Hunter Biden in South Africa with his security detail, Trump revoked Secret Service protection for Ashley and Hunter. Today’s show breaks it down.

title: Watch: Why Donald Trump Just Took Away Hunter Biden's Taxpayer-funded Bodyguards

description:

NEW: Transgender influencer announces they are leaving the United States, starts selling Burt's Bees Overnight Lip Treatment to fund the move.

Lmao, that's a new one.

"I'm leaving the country, and I could use a little help... I'm leaving by the end of the year with my fiance to… pic.twitter.com/0otoUBUuWp
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: Trans Influencer announces they/them are moving out of Trump's America, hopes lip balm sponsorship with will help fund the move

description:
President Trump revoked Secret Service protection for Ashley & Hunter Biden after images surfaced of Hunter Biden in South Africa with his security detail, a French politician demanded that Americans return the Statue of Liberty to France, we did a deep dive on incoming MSNBC Senior Washington Correspondent Eugene Daniels, Whoopi Goldberg said she’s afraid of getting deported, Reddit is a cesspool of antisemitic liberals, and much more!

We eagerly await the release of the JFK files today and will update you live as we are able.

FRANCE WANTS LADY LIBERTY BACK?
title: Sources: From Hunter Biden's Security to the JFK Files - How the Trump Admin is Exposing Deceit

description:
Democrats have spent decades on a government bureaucracy that ensures even when they aren't in power, they're still in control. Donald Trump and Cousin Elon are dismantling it, so it behooves the left and the media (but I repeat myself) to oppose anything they do, regardless of what that is. It would appear that would include opposing Donald Trump's deporting violent, illegal immigrant gang members. A group of leftists on CNN attempted to make the case to Scott Jennings why Trump doing so is a bad thing. Jennings, to his credit, remained a voice of reason.

Let's not pretend that it's just CNN, however. CBS News compared Trump's deporting illegal gang members to be no different from what the Irish faced when they immigrated to America. Get it? Because yesterday was St. Patrick's Day.
title: CNN goes all in on supporting violent gangs of illegal migrants (to the utter bemusement of Scott Jennings)

description:
July 25th, 2025.

Happy Gilmore 2.

We've been saying this a lot since election day. But, dude: We. Are. So. Back.

It's just a teaser
title: The trailer AND release date for "Happy Gilmore 2" dropped and can be summed up in four words: We Are So Back!

description:
Here's a challenge. I want my fellow oldheads to name me a Semisonic song besides "Closing Time" without using the Google. If any of you youngbloods can tell me what a Semisonic is without looking it up, you get two kudos. The band has been mentioned twice in the past thirty years. The first was when their hit was on MTV TRL (shout out Carson Daly). The second was yesterday when they complained about the White House using their song to brag about deporting criminals.

It was this hilarious video:

🎶You don't have to go home but you can't stay here🎶 @CBP pic.twitter.com/yWWhlvKQrb
— The White House (@WhiteHouse)
title: Anti-Trump 90's one-hit wonder band is super upset the White House used their song for hilarious deportation video
